pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analysis-of-Marginal-Tail-Means // Provides functions for implementing the Analysis-of-marginal-Tail-Means (ATM) method, a robust optimization method for discrete black-box optimization. Technical details can be found in Mak and Wu (2018+) arXiv:1712.03589. This work was supported by USARO grant W911NF-17-1-0007.
